event.title: Golden Wings
event.subtitle: A 50-Year Journey Through Aviation History
event.description: Golden Wings chronicles the remarkable career of Robyn Stewart, an American Airlines flight attendant whose 50+ years in the skies witnessed the transformation of commercial aviation.

theme.keyMessage: Soaring Through Five Decades of Innovation
theme.headlineAccent: From propeller days to jet-age hospitality, relive aviation's golden transformations.
featureCallouts: Witness cabin culture evolve from silver service to modern hospitality.
Experience the technological leaps that redefined long-haul comfort.
Celebrate the crew members who kept passengers inspired above the clouds.
mobileHighlights: Glide-ready layout for phones and tablets
Accessible typography tuned for in-flight lighting
